description:
A new chapter rises — and the Games will never be the same.
In THE HUNGER GAMES: Sunrise On The Reaping (2026), the world of Panem is thrust into chaos as the origins of the Games are rewritten. Secrets buried beneath the Capitol erupt into rebellion, and one unlikely tribute becomes the spark for a new era of fire, vengeance, and survival.

Experience breathtaking 4K action, stunning world-building, and the explosive rebirth of the Hunger Games saga in this Official Trailer.

🔥 THE HUNGER GAMES: Sunrise On The Reaping Official Trailer (2026) Games Change Forever | 4K | Action


A huge thank you to All of our Channel Members! 
Ya'll really do keep the lights on for us over here.
- The audio claims for our promotional features are getting out of hand.

Enjoy advanced 4K Upscaling and HDR-10 mastering across future trailers. Stay tuned for more.
